FuncDef: The license active command activates a license file on the current device. The license active command activates a license file on the current device. By default, the license file is not activated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the license file to be activated.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The file name extension is .dat, .xml, or .zip. The file name extension depends on the actual license file.

ExtraInfo: If the current license file on the device expires or feature specifications need to be expanded, you can run the license active command to replace or upgrade the license file.
